newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales to total $207 mln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales to total $207 mln for Thursday.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales for Thursday are expected to total $207 million in 14 offerings, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $76 million in 10 issues. The largest issue is a $17 million New Rochelle School District, N.Y., issue at 1100 EST.
Negotiated sales total $130 million in four offerings. The largest negotiated issue is a $75 million Alabama IDA revenue bond sale through JP Morgan Securities.
One additional issue totaling $15 million is on Reuters possible negotiated calendar, meaning underwriters have said they may price the deal Thursday depending on market conditions.
